name: Roundees
description:
You must lead as many Roundees as you can to a destination matching its color. You do it by building the path and also guiding them.

Instructions

Do not let them fall out of the map!

Roundess like to follow their preferred path indicated by their own color.
Watch out for crossroads, for they are tricky!

Building is as easy as clicking on a valid empty slot.
You can rotate the tile by pressing Space Bar or R key.
You paint a path by selecting the color with 1, 2, 3 or 4 keys and then left clicking it. By right clicking on a path, you reset it.
Move the camera with WASD or Arrow Keys.
To zoom, just scroll with the mouse wheel.

If you are certain that a Roundee is on the correct path, you can click it to make it go faster.

Where do the Roundees come from? Where do they go? Nobody knows.

Updates after submission:

- Fixing a bug in the Game Over Screen making the game stuck
- Removed some cheat/debugger shortcuts :P 

WebGL/HTML5 Version here:
https://mementogames.com/jams/Roundees/Roundees_Web/index.html
